# Schwannden Kuo Resume Website

> A modern, responsive resume website built with Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS 4 beta. Features comprehensive resume data, speaking engagements, publications, and professional portfolio showcasing for Schwannden Kuo, Software and System Architect.

## Project Structure

This is a data-driven resume website with centralized content management. All resume data is structured in TypeScript interfaces within `src/data/resume.ts`, including work experience, skills, publications, speaking engagements, awards, and open source contributions.

The site uses Next.js app router architecture with static export configured for GitHub Pages deployment. Professional design optimized for readability and ATS compatibility.

## Key Architecture

- **Data Layer**: Centralized resume data with TypeScript interfaces in `src/data/resume.ts`
- **Components**: Reusable UI components following shadcn/ui patterns in `src/components/ui/`
- **Pages**: Main resume page and dedicated speaking portfolio page
- **Deployment**: GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline for automated GitHub Pages deployment
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS 4 beta with custom design system and professional typography

## Development Commands

- `npm run dev` - Start development server with Turbopack
- `npm run build` - Build for production (static export)
- `npm run lint` - Run ESLint
- `npm run format` - Format with Prettier
- `npm run type-check` - TypeScript type checking

## Tech Stack Documentation

- [Next.js 15](https://nextjs.org/docs): React framework with App Router and static export
- [React 19](https://react.dev/reference/react): Frontend library with latest features
- [Tailwind CSS 4](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/installation/framework-guides/nextjs): Utility-first CSS framework (beta)
- [shadcn/ui](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/installation/next): Component library patterns
- [Turbopack](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/api-reference/turbopack): Fast development bundler
- [TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/): Type safety and developer experience

## Project Files

- `CLAUDE.md`: Development guidance for Claude Code
- `docs/theme.md`: Complete theme system implementation guidelines and best practices
- `src/data/resume.ts`: Centralized resume data and TypeScript interfaces
- `src/app/layout.tsx`: Root layout with SEO metadata and structured data
- `src/app/page.tsx`: Main resume page
- `src/app/speaking/page.tsx`: Speaking engagements portfolio
- `next.config.js`: Next.js configuration for static export
- `.github/workflows/deploy.yml`: GitHub Actions deployment pipeline
